entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [AOT publish error] EXEC : error : Arithmetic operation resulted in an overflow. #97235
  • Process Start method behaving differently #97233
  • Assertion failed 'this->Prev()->KindIs(BBJ_CALLFINALLY)' #97231
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: The MemoryMarshal cast must support nullable types #97230
  • Add missing GC and Threads performance counters in Net-6 #97229
  • Emulated x86 and x64 .NET 8 on AARCH64 can't restore project #97228
  • JsonSerializer.Serialize produces invalid JSON for [JsonExtensionData] property #97225
    Future
  • [mono][tvos] `System.Linq.Tests` crashing in `mono_gc_wbarrier_value_copy_internal` #97224
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Obsolete all Rfc2898DeriveBytes constructors #97221
  • [browser][AOT] convert the LLVM value V to DTYPE #97217
    9.0.0
  • [Build] Console output lost #97211
  • [Android] Application crashes when an exception is thrown after running a System.Diagnostics.Process #97209
    9.0.0
  • Suggestion: Runtime support for faster BigInteger #97199
  • [Blazor] Unable to debug in lazy loaded assemblies with remote authentication failed #97198
  • [API Proposal]: Asynchronous memory operation APIs for future hardware offloading and acceleration #97194
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitives operations that are currently scalar only #97193
    9.0.0
  • TensorPrimitives.IndexOfXx methods sometimes return the wrong index in the face of equality #97190

Closed

  • CheckInterfaces is too permissive and not permissive enough #96436
    9.0.0
  • Profiled casts: isinst is no longer hoisted #96837
    9.0.0
  • crashinfounix.cpp: unknown type name 'off64_t' on Alpine Linux #84665
    9.0.0
  • PublishAot doesn't respect TreatWarningsAsErrors #94178
    9.0.0
  • [Fuzzlyn] Assertion failed 'tgtIG' during 'Generate code' #96224
    9.0.0
  • [JIT] PerfScore includes code size impact? #96878
    9.0.0
  • Enable EVEX embedded rounding support in xarch emitter #93154
    9.0.0
  • IL3050 IL2026 analyzers ignores EnableConfigurationBindingGenerator property #97204
  • OpenSslCachedSystemStoreProvider DER loading does not work #97001
    9.0.0
  • Large MacOS deployed size with NativeAOT including large __LINKEDIT file #96997
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] legacy JS interop needs GC boundaries on main thread too #90044
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: _ParallelCrashTester::ParallelCrashTester.ParallelCrashMainThread() #94652
  • Executing http request in node-wasm does not work anymore #96210
    9.0.0
  • System.Text.Json - Allow Deserialisation to set properties with private setters without polluting domain objects with deserialisation attributes #97206
  • Run single test using docker image #95436
    9.0.0
  • System.NotImplementedException:: ILCompiler.DependencyAnalysis.ReadyToRunHelperNode.EmitInlineTLSAccess #97168
  • Assert failure: orObject->HasEmptySyncBlockInfo() #96790
    9.0.0
  • Undefined behavior should not be invoked when a ComObject marshaled by UniqueComInterfaceMarshaller<T> is used after calling FinalRelease #96901
    9.0.0
  • Replace DOS stub due to potential copyright issue #97048

PullRequests

Created

  • Late cast expansion: castclass #97237
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid deadlocks in TypeDescriptor #97236
    area-System.ComponentModel, 9.0.0
  • Late cast expansion: remove the null check if possible #97234
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove old loop code #97232
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add an internal mode to `Lock` to have it use non-alertable waits #97227
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [Mono]: Add "driver" support to Mono AOT cross compiler. #97226
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Add Arm64 encoding for IF_SVE_BL_1A #97223
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove Compiler::fgIsBetterFallThrough #97222
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • fix: update README.md #97219
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [iOS] Introduce support for linking ICU libs #97216
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [browser] Fix debugger support #97213
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Create directory for Binding Tools For Swift #97208
    area-Meta
  • Get rid of `EETypePtr` #97207
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Convert Array.CopySlow to managed #97202
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix Type.GetHashCode for RuntimeTypes w/o MethodTable #97195
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add lots more TensorPrimitives operations #97192
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Remove Compiler::fgConnectFallThrough and BBJ_COND fix-ups in loop phases #97191
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Reenable branch optimizations when running with llvm. #97189
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] EventPipe: Don't clean up thread list on shutdown #97188
    area-Tracing-coreclr

Merged

  • Implement remaining unimplemented APIs for Builder types #96805
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Limit `PNSE` by using Invariant `HashCode` in `HybridGlobalization` #96354
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • JIT: Late expansion for casts #97075
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Allow compacting loop header blocks #97205
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NativeAOT implement warning as errors as a compiler feature #96567
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix phase order problem with throw helper blocks #97201
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: remove size contribution to perf score #97069
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove xunit-specific Rosyln analyzer testing packages #97220
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Enable EVEX feature: Embedded Rounding for Avx512F.Add() #94684
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [NativeAOT] Linux/ARM bring-up (3/n) #97104
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • runtime: minor bugs fixed in coreclr and libraries #97155
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Move ComLibrary test projects for host tests to pre-built assets #97185
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Rewind the BIO before attempting to re-process as DER #97003
    area-System.Security
  • Use insGetPredicateType for SVE encodings #97142
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [browser] remove legacy js interop #96841
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Update HP libunwind to v1.8.0 #96969
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update README.md and replace .NET Cores with .NET #97197
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Disable dump creation for ParallelCrashTester child #97095
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add note about docker in the testing doc (fix #95436) #95557
    documentation, area-Meta, community-contribution
  • JIT: Compact newly recognized loops #97149
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] [tests] Set error for mono_fullaot runtime tests when no suitable tests are found #96902
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Use whole assembly name when looking for already loaded assemblies #97144
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.3
  • Update eng/common files manually to latest without Arcade itself #97167
    area-Infrastructure
  • NativeAOT: Ignore preferSize and always expand TLS #97187
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adding vectorized implementations of Exp to Vector64/128/256/512 #97114
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Ensure syncblock is cleared with GC_ALLOC_ZEROING_OPTIONAL #97174
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add ContainsAny{Except} path to SearchValues #96924
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • Use ParallelTheory attribute to run cases in parallel #97111
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-enhancement
  • Make multiple calls to FinalRelease safe #97059
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Initialize nextRefPosition #97169
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • ARM64-SVE: Implement IF_SVE_ED_1A, IF_SVE_EE_1A, IF_SVE_EB_1A, IF_SVE_EC_1A #97238
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Parse CallConvSwift in CoreCLR/NativeAOT and block struct types #96707
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add public APIs for persisted AssemblyBulder #97177
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #97072
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Frozen objects should be identified as Gen2 in the handle table #97109
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Add SSA transformation and SSA based optimization #96315
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix computing available memory on OSX for GC #97102
    area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • X86 unix fixes #97089
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Experiment: Optimize lsra when enregisterLocalVars is false #96386
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • breaking a string on many lines produce incorrect result if followed by a call #96948
    area-System.CodeDom, community-contribution
  • Add TextWriter.CreateBroadcasting #96732
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Stop tracking `genReturnBB` after global morph #97130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] Use auto thread dispatch in HTTP #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Enable Windows runs of AddressSanitizer #95758
    area-Infrastructure
  • TryAddEnumerable test avoid false negatives #96871
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Remove some timeouts and reorganize tests #97115
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Do not throw in AssemblyExtensions.TryGetRawMetadata. #96370
    area-System.Reflection, runtime-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0][mono][debugger] Debugger improvements on .net8 #97160
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.x
  • [wasm][mt] throw from blocking wait on JS interop threads #97052
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_JD_4A` to `SVE_JN_3B` #97129
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Bridging generic constraints doc #97084
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Skip `BBJ_CALLFINALLYRET` in `BasicBlock::VisitEHSuccs` #97184
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Test HalfTest: fixed payload preservation testcase for RISC-V #96888
    community-contribution, arch-riscv, needs-area-label
  • Test #96650
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0][browser] BrowserWebSocket.ReceiveAsync after server initiated close #97002
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.3
  • Add TaskCompletionSource.SetFromTask #97077
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [QUIC] Call silent shutdown in case `CloseAsync` failed. #96807
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • JIT: Establish loop invariant base case based on IR #97182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Code coverage for Server-side OCSP stapling #97099
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [RISC-V] Update TODOs for RiscV64 Machine and Architecture in Crossgen2 #97021
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [wip][browser] Refactor AssertFilesOnDisk function to check subset of files #97031
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [RISC-V] Enable R2RDump #97156
    area-R2RDump-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Don't copy runner to test output during regular builds #96826
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-19
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement lazy PI #2489
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement most of globalization #2490
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • appsettings.json with underscore for long #38141
  • dotnet build --no-incremental bypasses NETSDK1134 #38139
  • `dotnet publish` is not idempotent for single file publishing when project contains App.config #38128

Closed

  • `NU5039` / `NU5046` The file does not exist in the package. #38124
  • Question: why not add `IsTestProject` to project property when create a test project? #3790
  • dotnet ef sdk doent't work in Ubuntu 22.4 #38114

PullRequests

Created

  • Add MSI garbage collection for side-by-side workload manifests #38143
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38140
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #38127
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change the hard code of System.Data.SqlClient package version #38123
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Avoid elevation if we will noop in MSI-based operations to adjust the install state #38117
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Remove unneeded strings from an error message #37973
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Enable msbuild terminal logger for dotnet test #38098
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38110
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #38046
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #38092
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Identify riscv64 as valid arch #37994
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.2xx] Add dotnet package search #37916
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Cherry pick change to fix up the CPM versions to package specific versions #38116
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Hide stack on WorkloadResolver constructor error #38091
    untriaged, Area-SdkResolvers
  • Use workload sets as per user request #37681
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-19
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Partial properties #6420
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Change ref safety errors to warnings in unsafe contexts #6476

  • [Proposal]: Dictionary expressions #7822
  • Null-conditional assignment #6045

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NotNullIfNotNull also requires casting to non-nullable type for valuetypes #71728
  • EditorConfig parsing doesn't match spec #71727
    17.10
  • Gracefully handle misplaced `!` token after type names #71723
  • Collection expression spreads on arrays can result in variance exceptions #71720
    17.10
  • IDE0060 false positive with [EnumeratorCancellation] attribute #71719
  • Extract Interface / Pull Up should remove [Enumeratorancellation] attributes #71718
  • IDE0059 triggered incorrectly, removing assignment would break functionality #71717
    Backlog

Closed

  • Invalid IL generated for intercepted callsite #70841
    17.10
  • Action Command implementation under C# 8 #71463
  • Compilation failed with an explicit event block and primary constructor #71669

PullRequests

Created

  • Another attempt at getting TelemetryLogger working in VSCode #71734
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Prefer converting to ReadOnlySpan for spread optimization when we do not need to write #71733
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix line endings of semantic snippets #71731
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Helping runtime diagnose a CI bug #71724
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use Regex source generator in compiler #71721
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add native lock feature #71716
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update to MicroBuildSigningPlugin V3 #71715
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2357931 #71732
  • Don't create the InheritanceMarginTagger for preview views. #71618
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • TelemetryLogging.Log* methods should be calling free on the passed in KeyValueLogMessage #71608
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Move projects to different directories #71700
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to main #71730
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix intercepting a struct or enum base method #71655
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Revert "Merge pull request #70170 from mgoertz-msft/dev/mgoertz/xaml-… #71726
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2357820 #71729
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2356551 #71685
  • Fixing typos #71722
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Mac crash dumps #71706
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Switch CpsDiagnosticItemSourceProvider to use IProjectTree/ProjectTreeFlags #71664
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Address UIDelays in AbstractGraphProvider.GetCommands #71707
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.9 to main #71735
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix intercepting an instance method with a generic extension method #71658
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Gladstone #71135
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Prevent error propagations by misplaced semicolon in list parsing #71712
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Check Frame's VSFPROPID_IsDocDataInitialized before Getting DocData #71102
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • EditorConfig comments cannot follow a property value #51625
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Editor Config
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` #70971
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Revert deadlock mitigation that causes other deadlocks #71713
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid visiting reachable local functions with default state #71679
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Start local function analysis in unreachable state #71506
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] Add `NavigationManager.GetUriWithHash()` #53499
  • WebSocketException due to a handshake problem between client and server in Blazor Server App #53498
  • BasePath is not honoured when requesting/serving hot-reload scripts #53497
  • Stacking [Parameter] and [SupplyParameterFromQuery] #53496
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudDeleteProduct, ApiCrudListProducts #53495
  • Perf regression: fortunes, mvc #53494
  • Perf improvement: mvc #53493
  • Unexpected error: System.InvalidOperationException after Hot Reload #53492
  • Blazar WebAssembly with ClientCertificateMode.RequireCertificate #53491
  • RequestDelegate is not injected on middlewares using Primary Constructor #53490
  • SignalR OnDisconnect not called when client re-connects #53488
  • InputNumber race condition bug when holding key up to increase the value when internet connection is slow and rendermode is InteractiveServer #53487
  • BlazorWebAssemblyStandaloneWithIdentity and Offline support #53484
  • Blazor 8 navigation, when App.razor and Routes.razor not placed in the startup project #53483
  • Using per page/component render modes, cascading parameters turn null after rendering. #53482
  • [Routing] Should we decode `2FA` into `/` before running constraints #53480
  • Reconsider logging configuration approach in App Service Logging Providers #53479

Closed

  • Blazor Server architectural concerns #50808
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Blazor: Let browser handle hash change #52583
    8.0.x
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #52911
  • Perf regression: plaintext #53472
  • Exception when navigating between Blazor pages with a [SupplyParameterFromQuery] of the same name but different type #52483
    8.0.x
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot #53478
  • The POST request does not specify which form is being submitted. #53382
  • [QuickGrid] When pagination is provided the extra rows being added to the body do not have `td`s being added to them #52822
    Backlog
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps #53428

PullRequests

Created

  • [Blazor] Prevent NPE in ExternalLogin.razor #53500
    area-mvc
  • SignalR performance: track groups per connection, remove on disconnect #53486
    area-signalr
  • Change nullability annotations of HostString.Value to explicitly allow null #53485
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `7c07a86` to `96cd50c` #53481
    area-infrastructure
  • Pass template tests when project reference contains ".db" #53476
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Delete unused docker infrastructure #53474
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Avoid fetching new page content when only the hash changes #53341
    area-blazor
  • Honor BuildNodeJS property in SourceBuild #53489
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix stale values from [SupplyParameterFromQuery] #53443
    area-blazor
  • Add td tag to empty rows #53473
    area-blazor

Updated

  • [Blazor] Prevent NPE in ExternalLogin.razor #53222
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • Fixes encoded values on Blazor Router #53470
    area-blazor
  • Added a null check in ResolveHasInvalidAntiforgeryValidationFeature() #53208
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Application not crashing if a resource string is incorrect in XAML #20018
  • Binding issues with MAUI embedded in iOS when Page uses ControlTemplate #20016
  • [iOS] Shell tab titles don't truncate and they overlap in iOS unlike Android #20015
  • CollectionView in Toolkit Popup not work properly #20012
  • iOS Scroll down in ListView with labels of type html causes exception #20008
  • TapGestureRecognizer popUpTapGesture = new TapGestureRecognizer(); not working #20007
  • Splash screen image is not displayed after installation. #20005
  • Expander is not working in ios inside collectionview #20004
  • Strange shadows of Popup on MAC #20003
  • [DataTemplate/CollectionView] : Inconsistent behavior btw Release/Debug config with Xaml -> Bindings not working when x:DataType is not specified in Release mode #20002
  • Application display version not updating on iOS Local Device #20000
  • AccessViolationException in Release Mode when Adding Custom Resource Dictionary #19999
  • Missing constructor for PropertyMapper in iOS TabbedRenderer?! #19998
  • Facing issues with the Entry, DatePicker, and CheckBox components when applying themes. #19997
  • Tabbar of TabbedPage showed in Flyout after re-appearing - Android #19989

Closed

  • Blazor Hybrid is not supported on Macs running MacOS 11. #19613
  • Net Maui Windows Titlebar color is not working as expected #19709
  • Can't add an array to a xaml resource dictionary #20020
  • [regression/8.0.3] [Android] Button ripple effect not working #18815
    Triaged
  • [regression/7.0.0] Entry Return command not firing up - .NET MAUI MVVM on Android #13921
    .NET 8 SR2
  • Maui support on linux #20011
  • Inability to Access BottomNavigationBar in TabbedPage on Android for Customization #20009

PullRequests

Created

  • [iOS] Figure a better EstimatedItemSize for HorizontalList #20022
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃
  • Enable building WASDK Self-Contained packaged apps #20019
  • Make sure we support keyed services #20014
  • Fixes carouselview layout on iOS #20001
    community ✨
  • [.NET 9] Reconcile all NET8 //TODO Add this API comments #19996
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Trimming] Allow creating TypedBinding from expressions #19995
    area/app-size 🤏
  • Make sure to await async test asserts #19994
  • [Trimming] Replace trimming unsafe usage of implicit operators through reflection with IValueConverters #19992
    area/app-size 🤏
  • Source Generator Performance Improvements #19990

Merged

  • Process the hardware enter key as "Done" #16386
    area/controls 🎮, stale, Under Consideration
  • Optimize IndexOf lookups #19963
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • Re-generate the template files #19993
  • Fix Developer Tools option setting for Blazor Hybrid Mac Catalyst view. #19909
    area/tooling ⚙️
  • [main] Update version for nightly #19981

Updated

  • [Housekeeping] Added UI Test to validate project template #18567
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, stale
  • Translucent and Transparent NavigationBar on iOS #19204
    area/navigation 🧭, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, partner/cat 😻, stale, .NET 8 SR2
  • use MathF where possible #19965
    community ✨
  • Add animated GIF support for Image #19411

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TPC + Owned Entities Configuration #32870
  • If `int` column is inherited from abstract class, it's always `nullable: false` #32866
  • EF8 core: filtering by enum doesn't work with TPH and OfType #32865
  • Primary key datatype change does not consider dropping primary key constraint in generated script #32864
  • [Microsoft.Data.Sqlite] iOS apps are terminated every time they enter the background if they share an encrypted database with an app extension #32863
  • Is there any example of a C# entity that can use SqlServerUdtTypeMapping for attribute/column mapping? #32862

Closed

  • Why is a static constructor added to the SqlServerTypeMappingSource class? #32861
  • Revisit ExecuteUpdate is not working with Sqlite #32868
  • Navigations were separated into two relationships since the [ForeignKey] attribute was specified on navigations on both sides. #32854

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Use the unpatched shared framework as the minimum requirement for tools. #32869
    Servicing-consider
  • Add complex type mappings to the default relational mappings #32867

Merged

  • Make TableExpressionBase.Alias immutable #32815

Updated

  • Move all pruning code to the pruner and make it an immutable visitor #32817
  • Handle complex types in GetDatabaseValues #32813

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-19
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • DownloadFile failing repeatedly on Darwin_Build_Release_x64 despite the file being there #17588

PullRequests

Created

  • Update SDK assembly exclusions #18311
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #18310
  • Condition inner-clone properties #18307
  • Add DotNetBuildOrchestrator flag #18306

Merged

  • Update SB SDK diff exclusions and baseline #18309
  • Configure pipeline to run offline correctly #18304
  • Identify riscv64 as valid arch #18247

Updated

  • Add install state cleanup to finalizer #18266
